text: Ardi Idrus (born 22 January 1993 in Ternate) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a full-back for Liga 1 club Persib Bandung. ==Honours== === Individual === *Liga 1 Best Eleven: 2018 ==References== == External links == *Ardi Idrus at Soccerway *Ardi Idrus at Liga Indonesia Category:Living people Category:1993 births Category:Indonesian footballers Category:People from Ternate Category:Sportspeople from North Maluku Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Persib Bandung players
title: Ardi Idrus
